name: sawed-off shotgun
description: A classic sawed-off double barrel shotgun. Nothing fancy, but gets the job done.

name: Stormtrooper badge
description: A rectangular ID badge identifying the wearer as a member of the Stormtroopers unit.

name: Elite Stormtrooper badge
description: A rectangular ID badge identifying the wearer as a member of the Stormtroopers unit. This one indicates that the wearer is an Elite Stormtrooper, indicating significant war merits.

name: psionic connection device
description: This device allows you to connect with the minds of living things and drive them insane, hurt them or even make them 'join you'. Prolonged use can cause pain, fatigue and possibly some other side effects.

name: Mycus research report
description: This is a detailed scientific report describing various findings about the Mycus - behaviour, interaction with other organisms, strengths and weaknesses etc. it's not much use for you, but maybe someone out there could use it to figure out how to stop those fungals.

name: psionic research report
description: This is a detailed scientific report describing various findings about the so-called 'psionic'. The research on this field has been certainly inspired by the discover of the Mycus hivemind.

name: psionic connection device documentation
description: This is a detailed documentation describing the capabilities of a psionic connection device as well as the way to make it.
